QuestData.Title: S.P.A.R.E. Crates
QuestData.Description:
I'm sure you agree that Pascal-K1N6 is the greatest invention you've ever seen!
If you're not convinced yet, try to push him to his limits. I don't mind!
Bring him more resources and blueprints -- he'll craft anything you need!
QuestData.LogDescription: Craft $1oa Junkyard Tinkering items with Pascal-K1N6.
